data.title: Celebrities Who Are 5 Feet 3 Inches (160 cm) Tall
data.meta_description: Celebrities Who Are 5 Feet 3 Inches (160 cm) Tall
data.text:
1

Billie Eilish

(The Youngest Recipient of the Grammy Award for Album of the Year and Record of the Year)

4134

469

Listed In: Singers

Birthdate: December 18, 2001

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Los Angeles, California, United States

A young singer and songwriter who rose to international fame while still in her teens, Billie Eilish is blessed with a soprano vocal range and an ethereal voice. Already the recipient of numerous accolades, including five Grammy awards, she was named in Time magazine’s inaugural "Time 100 Next" list in 2019.

2

Scarlett Johansson

(Actress Known for Her Films: 'Marriage Story', 'Jojo Rabbit' and Her Role of 'Black Widow' in MCU Films)

1123

347

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: November 22, 1984

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Manhattan, New York, United States

The popular, award winning gorgeous artist, Scarlett Johansson is the highest paid actress in the world. With an interest in acting, Scarlett Johansson debuted in films at the young age of eight and went on to act in numerous films including Lost in Translation, The Avengers, Hitchcock and Marriage Story. She has also worked in television and released an album.

3

Natalie Portman

(American Actress Known for Her Films: 'Closer', 'Black Swan' and as 'Jane Foster' in 'Thor' Movies)

384

130

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: June 9, 1981

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Jerusalem, Israel

Debuting at the age of thirteen, Israeli American actress Natalie Portman is today one of the most successful actresses in Hollywood. Her movie list is impressive with successful projects like Black Swan, Jackie, Star Wars, Closer and Thor. While pursuing her passion for acting, the Academy award winning actress also ensured to complete her studies and graduated from Harvard University.

Recommended Lists:

4

Eazy-E

(Rapper Known as the 'Godfather of Gangsta Rap')

392

147

Listed In: Singers

Birthdate: September 7, 1964

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Compton, California, United States

Died: March 26, 1995

Widely regarded as the godfather of gangsta rap, Eazy-E was a rapper and record producer. He played a major role in popularizing gangsta rap and West Coast rap by forming N.W.A, which is considered one of the most influential and greatest hip hop groups of all time. Eazy-E died at the age of 30 after being diagnosed with AIDS.

Recommended Lists:

5

Winona Ryder

(Actress Best Known for Her Films: 'Beetlejuice', 'The Age of Innocence' and 'Little Women')

325

104

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: October 29, 1971

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Winona, Minnesota, United States

Actress Winona Ryder is known for her roles in successful and critically acclaimed films such as Heathers, Edward Scissorhands, Girl, Interrupted, Little Women and The Age of Innocence. She also starred in the hit show Stranger Things. She has been in the news for her relationships, including that with superstar Johnny Depp and a 2001 arrest for shoplifting.

6

Amanda Seyfried

(Actress Who Rose to Fame With Her Role in Films: 'Mean Girls' and 'Mamma Mia!')

336

76

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: December 3, 1985

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Allentown, Pennsylvania, United States

Amanda Seyfried is an American actress, singer and model, who started acting as a teenager. She became famous when she starred in the teen comedy Mean Girls and then for her recurring role in the television series Veronica Mars. Mamma Mia, Solstice, Chloe, Letters to Juliet, Les Misérables, The Big Wedding and Gringo are some of her notable and successful films.

Recommended Lists:

7

Cardi B

(The First Female Rapper to Achieve Multiple Diamond-Certified Songs by the RIAA)

400

253

Listed In: Lyricists & Songwriters

Birthdate: October 11, 1992

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Washington Heights, New York, United States

Rap legend Cardi B rose from being an exotic dancer and internet celebrity to being featured on Forbes and Time 100. Her triple-platinum-certified debut album, Invasion of Privacy, topped the Billboard 200. She was the only female solo artist to win the Grammy for the Best Rap Album.

8

Kelly Clarkson

(Winner of 1st Season of 'American Idol')

336

102

Listed In: Singers

Birthdate: April 24, 1982

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Fort Worth, Texas, United States

Regarded as the personification of the perfect pop star, Kelly Clarkson is a product of American Idol. After winning the competition, she went on to become a popular star and was named in VH1's 100 Greatest Women in Music list. She has also inspired other popular musicians, such as Kelsea Ballerini and Demi Lovato. Kelly is also a well-known philanthropist.

Recommended Lists:

9

Rebel Wilson

(Australian Actress and Comedian)

288

107

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: March 2, 1980

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Sydney, Australia

Australian actress, Rebel Wilson, started her acting career with television in Australia and then gained wider recognition after appearing in Hollywood films. Struck by Lightning, Bachelorette, Isn't It Romantic, The Hustle, Cats and Jojo Rabbit are some of the notable films she has acted in. She received critical appreciation for the 2012 film, Pitch Perfect, and subsequently acted in its two sequels.

10

Lily-Rose Depp

(Actress, Model and Daughter of the American Actor, Johnny Depp, and French Actress Vanessa Paradis)

281

139

Listed In: Fashion

Birthdate: May 7, 1999

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Paris, France

Lily-Rose Depp is the daughter of famous American actor Johnny Depp and popular French singer and model Vanessa Paradis. Lily-Rose followed in her parents' footsteps to become active in the entertainment industry. Despite suffering from anorexia in the past, Lily-Rose Depp has managed to establish herself as an actress in Hollywood.

Recommended Lists:

11

Gillian Anderson

(Actress)

192

76

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: August 9, 1968

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Chicago, Illinois, United States

Height: 5'3" (160 cm)

12

Kat Dennings

(Actress)

218

55

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: June 13, 1986

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania, United States

Kat Dennings is an American actress who gained international fame after appearing in the popular TV series 2 Broke Girls. Known for her attractive curvaceous figure, Kat Dennings has been the dream girl of men around the world. A teetotaler who practices Transcendental Meditation, Dennings serves as an inspiration to people who believe in sobriety.

Recommended Lists:

13

Sadie Sink

(Actress)

444

76

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: April 16, 2002

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Brenham, Texas, United States

Sadie Sink is an American actress best known for playing Maxine Mayfield in the popular horror mystery-thriller television series Stranger Things, for which she received nominations at MTV Movie & TV Awards and Screen Actors Guild Awards. In 2018, she was honored with the Award of Excellence for Narration for her contribution to an animal rights documentary titled Dominion.

14

Alison Brie

(Actress)

168

60

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: December 29, 1982

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Los Angeles, California, United States

Height: 5'3" (160 cm)

Recommended Lists:

15

Carrie Underwood

(Country Singer)

244

53

Listed In: Singers

Birthdate: March 10, 1983

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Muskogee, Oklahoma, United States

Carrie Underwood is an American singer-songwriter and one of the best female country music singers of all time. Dubbed Country Music's reigning Queen, Underwood has influenced several other singers, such as Kelsea Ballerini, Lucy Hale, Lauren Alaina, Mollie King, and Danielle Bradbery. In 2014, she was named on Time magazine's list of 100 most influential people in the world.

16

Julianne Moore

(Actress and Author Known for Her Films: ‘The Lost World: Jurassic Park’, ‘Boogie Nights’ and ‘Still Alice’)

230

78

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: December 3, 1960

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Fort Bragg, North Carolina, United States

Widely regarded as one of the most accomplished and talented actresses of her generation, Julianne Moore was included in Time magazine's 100 most influential people in the world list in 2015. One of the most decorated actresses, Moore specializes in playing emotionally troubled women. A campaigner for gun control and gay rights, she has also written several children's books.

Recommended Lists:

17

Isla Fisher

(Australian Actress Known for Her Films: ‘Wedding Crashers’, ‘Confessions of a Shopaholic’, ‘Bachelorette’ and ‘Scooby-Doo’)

212

108

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: February 3, 1976

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Muscat, Oman

Australian actress Isla Fisher attained widespread fame in 2005 when she starred in the commercially successful Hollywood film Wedding Crashers. Some of her other notable films are The Great Gatsby, Now You See Me, I Heart Huckabees, Bachelorette, Rango and Rise of the Guardians. She has also acted in television series and is an author of children’s books.

18

Vanessa Paradis

(Singer, Model and Actress)

184

51

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: December 22, 1972

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Saint-Maur-des-Fossés, France

French singer and actress, Vanessa Paradis, became a celebrity at the age of 14 with the French song Joe le taxi in 1987. She tasted further success with English songs like Be My Baby and many other French songs. She has also acted in several French films and has modelled regularly for high-end fashion products by Chanel like perfume and handbags.

Recommended Lists:

19

Lucy Liu

(Famous for Her Role in TV Series 'Ally McBeal' and Two 'Charlie's Angels' films.)

157

28

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: December 2, 1968

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Jackson Heights, New York, United States

American actress, Lucy Liu, shot to fame with television series Ally McBeal and later proved her acting skills with films like Charlie's Angels, Kill Bill, Volume 1, Shanghai Noon and television series Elementary and Southland. Intelligent and multitalented, she has voiced animated films, turned producer/director, made her Broadway debut and last but not the least, is also a visual artist.

20

Julia Louis-Dreyfus

(Actress and Comedian Known for Her Work in 'Saturday Night Live' and the TV Sitcom 'Seinfeld')

159

63

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: January 13, 1961

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: New York City, United States

An actress and comedian, Julia Louis-Dreyfus has won more Screen Actors Guild Awards and more Emmy Awards than any other artist in American television history. In 2016, she was named in Time magazine's 100 most influential people in the world list. In 2018, she was presented with America's highest comedy honor - The Mark Twain Prize for American Humor.

Recommended Lists:

21

Felicity Jones

(Actress)

135

45

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: October 17, 1983

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Birmingham

English actress Felicity Jones started her career as a child and went on to take up more mature roles as a teenager. One of her uncles is an actor, and he influenced her to take up the profession herself. She appeared in many TV shows in the initial years of her career before venturing into films as well.

22

Brittany Murphy

(Actress)

142

73

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: November 10, 1977

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Atlanta, Georgia, United States

Died: December 20, 2009

Britanny Murphy was an American singer and actress. She received critical acclaim for playing important roles in films like 8 Mile before leaving for heavenly abode due to pneumonia at age 32. A month after her demise, her mother and widower established a charitable fund called The Brittany Murphy Foundation, which aimed at aiding children's arts education and cancer research.

Recommended Lists:

23

Elisha Cuthbert

(Canadian Actress and Model Known for Role as ‘Kim Bauer’ in the TV Series ‘24’)

161

41

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: November 30, 1982

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Calgary, Alberta, Canada

Elisha Cuthbert is best known as Kim Bauer from 24, Darcie Goldberg from Old School, and Danielle from The Girl Next Door. She was a foot model at 9. Her other notable projects include the remake of House of Wax, The Ranch on Netflix, and Happy Endings on ABC.

24

Linda Cardellini

(Actress)

101

28

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: June 25, 1975

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Redwood City, California, United States

Height: 5'3" (160 cm)

Recommended Lists:

25

Pat Morita

(Actor and Comedian Known for His Role as ‘Miyagi’ in ‘The Karate Kid’ Film Series)

150

20

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: June 28, 1932

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Isleton, California, United States

Died: November 24, 2005

American actor, voice actor, and comedian, Pat Morita first gained recognition with drama series Happy Days, though it was his inspiring performance as Mr. Miyagi in The Karate Kid film series that really skyrocketed his fame. The Asian-American actor was also known for his TV movie Amos and animated movie Mulan and Mulan II where he voiced the Chinese Emperor.

26

Jodie Foster

(Actress & Director)

159

92

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: November 19, 1962

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Los Angeles, California, United States

Jodie Foster is considered to be one of the best actors of her time. She attained fame as a child actor in the acclaimed film Taxi Driver. Some of her memorable roles as an adult are The Accused, The Silence of the Lambs and Sommersby. She’s a director too. Foster has been in the news for her sexual orientation.

Recommended Lists:

27

Lauryn Hill

(One of the Greatest Rappers Of All Time)

135

43

Listed In: Singers

Birthdate: May 26, 1975

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Newark, New Jersey, United States

Famous rapper and singer, Lauryn Hill, is widely regarded as one of the greatest rappers of all time and a pioneer in the Neo soul genre. The artist whose album The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill won five Grammy Awards, is an inspiration for numerous singers and rappers. Earlier, she gained recognition as member of Fugees, an award-winning hip hop group.

28

Chanel West Coast

(Reality TV Personality Known for Her Role in MTV's 'Rob Dyrdek's Fantasy Factory' and 'Ridiculousness')

164

74

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: September 1, 1988

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Los Angeles, California, United States

Though she once complained that she doesn't get enough Instagram likes, rapper/actor Chanel West Coast is quite popular with young adults, who have admired her in MTV’s Rob Dyrdek's Fantasy Factory and Ridiculousness. Known for her trademark laughter and her vivacious nature, Chanel also owns the clothing brand LOL Cartel.

Recommended Lists:

29

Sally Field

(American Actress Who Became Famous for Portraying Firebrands and Steely Matriarchs)

123

54

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: November 6, 1946

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Pasadena, California, United States

An acclaimed American actress, Sally Field has won prestigious awards, such as Academy Awards and Emmy Awards. Apart from being a popular actress, Sally Field has also played an important role as an activist, advocating for gay rights and women's rights. She has been part of the board of directors of an international women's NGO called Vital Voices Global Partnership.

30

Cyndi Lauper

(Singer-Songwriter who Ruled the Billboard Hot 100 with Tracks Like ‘She Bop’ and ‘True Colors’)

160

61

Listed In: Lyricists & Songwriters

Birthdate: June 22, 1953

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Brooklyn, New York, United States

Cyndi Lauper is an American singer-songwriter, activist, and actress. Apart from her distinctive appearance, Lauper is also known for her achievements; having won three of the four major entertainment awards (Grammy, Emmy, Tony), she is consistently named in lists like 100 Greatest Women of Rock & Roll. Cyndi Lauper is also celebrated for her humanitarian work and charitable efforts.

Recommended Lists:

31

Kathy Bates

(Actress and Director Known for Her Films: 'Misery', ‘Fried Green Tomatoes’ and ‘Dolores Claiborne’)

137

41

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: June 28, 1948

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Memphis, Tennessee, United States

Best known as Molly Brown from Titanic, Annie Wilkes from Misery, and Ethel Darling from American Horror Story, two-time Emmy-winner Kathy Bates also has an Academy Award in her kitty. She has survived ovarian cancer and breast cancer and is now a prominent advocate for lymphatic disease awareness.

32

Ashley Tisdale

(Actress and Singer Known for Her Role in the TV Sitcom ‘The Suite Life of Zack & Cody’)

164

36

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: July 2, 1985

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Monmouth County, New Jersey, United States

Ashley Tisdale is an American actress and singer. Regarded as a sex symbol, Tisdale frequently appears on lists, such as Maxim's Hot 100. Also an influential social media personality, Tisdale was named by The Huffington Post as one of the most influential women on Twitter. Ashley Tisdale uses her popularity to raise funds for charitable organizations.

36

Kate Bush

(One of the Most Successful British Solo Performers of All Time)

113

27

Listed In: Lyricists & Songwriters

Birthdate: July 30, 1958

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Bexleyheath, England, United Kingdom

Kate Bush is best known for her UK Singles Chart-topper debut single Wuthering Heights. She has released 25 UK Top 40 singles, such as Babooshka and Running Up That Hill. She is known for her literary themes and drew inspiration from James Joyce’s Ulysses. She was also awarded the CBE.

37

Elsa Pataky

(Known for Her Role as Elena Neves in the 'Fast & Furious' Franchise)

108

49

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: July 18, 1976

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Madrid, Spain

Elsa Pataky is one of the most famous Spanish models and actresses to make it big in the American film industry. She is best known for playing Officer Elena Neves alongside Dwayne Johnson in The Fast and the Furious film franchise. A polyglot, Elsa Pataky can speak Spanish, English, Romanian, Portuguese, French, and Italian fluently.

38

Valerie Bertinelli

(Actress and Television Personality Known for Her TV Shows: ‘Valerie's Home Cooking’ and ‘Kids Baking Championship’)

136

34

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: April 23, 1960

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Wilmington, Delaware, United States

Valerie Bertinelli, better known as Melanie Moretti from the sitcom Hot in Cleveland and Gloria from Touched by an Angel, has also appeared as a host on several culinary shows on Food Network. Her role as Barbara Cooper Royer in One Day at a Time earned her a Golden Globe.

39

Gina Rodriguez

(Best Known for Her Role as ‘Jane Villanueva’ in the TV Series ‘Jane the Virgin’)

120

34

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: July 30, 1984

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Chicago, Illinois, United States

American actress Gina Rodriguez, who portrayed Jane Villanueva in the popular TV series Jane the Virgin, is also known for her involvement with charities and philanthropic efforts; in 2016, she was named in Oprah Winfrey's SuperSoul 100, a list of influential leaders and visionaries. Rodriguez also serves as an inspiration to several young Latina actresses.

40

Leah Remini

(Actress Best Known for Her Television Series: ‘The King of Queens’ and ‘Kevin Can Wait’)

102

36

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: June 15, 1970

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Brooklyn, New York, United States

Leah Remini is best known as Carrie Heffernan from The King of Queens and Vanessa from Kevin Can Wait. She also appeared in Dancing with the Stars. She was raised a Scientologist, but turned against the faith later, releasing an explanatory memoir and an Emmy-winning documentary series on the same.

41

Simo Häyhä

(Finnish Military Sniper in World War II)

180

41

Listed In: Miscellaneous

Birthdate: December 17, 1905

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Rautjärvi, Finland

Died: April 1, 2002

Simo Häyhä was a Finnish sniper who served in the Winter War against the Soviet Union, in 1939–1940. He had killed 500 men in the war and received many awards for his exploits. His face was disfigured by a Red Army bullet, and he later retired to a farm.

42

Bette Davis

(American Actress Who was Known for Playing Unsympathetic, Sardonic Characters)

95

35

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: April 5, 1908

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Lowell, Massachusetts, United States

Died: October 6, 1989

Two-time Academy Award-winner Bette Davis, a prominent figure from the Golden Age of Hollywood, was known for playing unlikeable characters and her addiction to cigarettes both off and on screen. Fans loved her in All About Eve and Human Bondage. Bette was also the first female AFI Lifetime Achievement Award-winner.

43

Milana Vayntrub

(Actress)

109

44

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: March 8, 1987

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Tashkent, Uzbekistan

Milana Vyantrub is an Uzbekistan-born American actress who is most recognised for her work in AT&T television commercials and NBC’s television series, This is Us. She began acting at the tender age of five to support her family financially. Since then, Milana Vyantrub has grown tremendously and worked in a host of films, television shows and web series. She is also known for her YouTube Channel.

44

Bo Derek

(Actress)

154

79

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: November 20, 1956

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Long Beach, California, United States

As a 16-year-old girl who loved surfing and sunbathing more than attending school, Bo Derek did not think twice before starting a sexual relationship with John Derek, 30 years her senior. She eventually starred in the comedy film, 10, and established herself as an actress. An animal welfare spokesperson and horse lover, Bo Derek continues to serve as an activist.

45

Carmen Electra

(Actress, Model and Singer Known for Her Role as ‘Lani McKenzie’ in the TV Series ‘Baywatch’)

136

73

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: April 20, 1972

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Sharonville, Ohio, United States

Carmen Electra is an actress, TV personality, and singer. One of the leading figures of glamour modeling, Carmen Electra gained popularity as a sex symbol. She is also one of the most popular Playboy models of all time. Apart from being a prominent media personality, Carmen also works with various non-profit organizations, such as Elevate Hope and HollyRod Foundation.

46

Pokimane

(Twitch Streamer and YouTuber)

198

100

Listed In: YouTubers

Birthdate: May 14, 1996

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Morocco

Pokimane is an award-winning Twitch streamer and an important member of an online social entertainment group called OfflineTV. An inspiration to gamers across the world, Pokimane is part of an online gaming revolution which is likely to have a major impact in future. Her popularity as a Twitch streamer and YouTuber earned her a cameo in the film Free Guy.

47

Jennifer Grey

(American Actress Known for Her Film ‘Dirty Dancing’)

75

24

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: March 26, 1960

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: New York City, New York, United States

American actress, Jennifer Grey, is best known for the 1986 film Ferris Bueller's Day Off and the 1987 film Dirty Dancing. Bloodhounds of Broadway, Bounce, The Wind Rises and In Your Eyes are some of her other notable films. She has also acted in several television series. A rhinoplasty procedure in the 1990s is said to have affected her career for sometime.

48

Charli XCX

(Singer and Songwriter Known for Her Hit Singles ‘I Love It’ and ‘Boom Clap’)

116

46

Listed In: Singers

Birthdate: August 2, 1992

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Cambridge, England, United Kingdom

Charli XCX began her career by posting songs on Myspace. She then began performing at parties, eventually gaining fame with collaborations such as I Love It, with Icona Pop, and Fancy, with Iggy Azalea. She released Billboard charters such as Boom Clap and co-wrote the Shawn Mendes-Camila Cabello hit Señorita.

49

Jennifer Jason Leigh

(Actress & Producer)

83

36

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: February 5, 1962

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Los Angeles, California, United States

Known for her Academy Award-nominated performance in The Hateful Eight, Jennifer Jason Leigh had started her career at age 9. Fans also loved her in Mrs. Parker and the Vicious Circle and Margot at the Wedding. She was also seen as Sally Bowles in Sam Mendes’s Broadway production Cabaret.
